thread.title: REPORT: Former Obama Officials Could Be In Trouble Over Wiretapping Scandal
thread.title_full: REPORT: Former Obama Officials Could Be In Trouble Over Wiretapping Scandal

author: Ben Marquis
title: REPORT: Former Obama Officials Could Be In Trouble Over Wiretapping Scandal
text:
Report: IRS Still Has Policies Allowing Targeting of Conservative Groups 
“Under the rules — and they’re pretty strict — you are supposed to, it is called minimization, you don’t name the American person who is being discussed,” he continued. 
“But the idea that there was intelligence value here is really thin,” Woodward said, according to the Washington Examiner . “It’s, again, down the middle, it is not what Trump said, but this could be criminal on the part of people who decided, ‘Oh, let’s name these people’.” 
Woodward added that, “(U)nder the rules, that name is supposed to be blanked out, and so you’ve got a real serious problem potentially of people in the Obama administration passing around this highly classified gossip.” Advertisement - story continues below 
The legendary Washington Post reporter is no fan of President Trump, but even he can see past his personal opinion on the matter and realize that it certainly appears as though some members of former President Barack Obama’s administration violated the law by “ unmasking ” the identities of Trump team members. 
Hopefully it will eventually be determined exactly who decided to expose Trump’s associates as part of the effort to undermine his incoming administration and hamstring him with scandal. Once those violators are revealed, they should be held to account for their criminal actions. 
Please share this on Facebook and Twitter so that everyone can see what Bob Woodward had to say about Trump’s transition team members being “unmasked” by former Obama officials. Advertisement - story continues below
